Package abs.exceptions

Package for ABS exceptions

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CredentialsInvalidException
    The password invalid exception is thrown when a user tried to login with a valid email but invalid password.
    MenuInputException
    MenuInputException is thrown when an inputed value is invalid.
    RegistrationNonUniqueException
    RegistrationNonUniqueException is thrown when the user tried to register with an existing email address.
    RegistrationValidationException
    RegistrationValidationException throws when the user enters an invalid input on the registration form.

Package abs.exceptions Description

Package for ABS exceptions

Includes validation of user input for login and registration. Unique email check, and menu input validation and password invalid.

See Also:
RegistrationNonUniqueException, MenuInputException, RegistrationValidationException, CredentialsInvalidException
